Reviews.Title: TV Was Defective
Reviews.Author: Roy Smith
Reviews.Content: TV was a defective unit and failed after 1-week of use. I contacted Panasonic service and when they came out to service TV...They told me the TV was a second hand unit and they would not honor any warranty work. I would not recommend this seller.

ProductInfo.Features:
Full HD Moving Picture Resolution*2 Speed of 1,200 Pixels/Second
Native Contrast of 5,000,000:1*1
The Panasonic plasma display panel offers a long life of approximately 100,000 hours*1 under normal operating conditions ? providing gorgeous HD images for many years.
ProductInfo.Name: Panasonic TH-65PF30U 65-Inch 1080p FHD Plasma Display
